edu.berkeley.compbio.phyloutils
Class HugenholtzTaxonomyService

java.lang.Object
  edu.berkeley.compbio.phyloutils.HugenholtzTaxonomyService
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.davidsoergel.trees.TaxonMergingPhylogeny<Integer>, TaxonomyService<Integer>, TaxonStringIdMapper<Integer>
public class HugenholtzTaxonomyService
extends Object
implements TaxonomyService<Integer>

Provides a view onto the Hugenholtz taxonomy using Integer IDs. The Hugenholtz taxonomy has integer ids (prokMSA_ids) at the leaves, but not at internal nodes. Some internal nodes have string names, but there is no guarantee of uniqueness. For various reasons we need a tree with unique Integer IDs throughout. This tree uses the prokMSA_ids at the leaves and generated IDs at internal nodes. It also allows looking up nodes by String name, including semicolon-delimited multilevel classifications.

Uniform leaf weights are provided.

Version:
$Id$
Author:
David Soergel
